Hello blank fragment
How do you prove to a customer that you are authorized to read their meter Show the customer your Certification Page Tell them you work with Tipy
What is the first thing to do after taking readings Close Meter Lid (if exists) Walk away
What do you do if you do not get access to an In-door meter to take data Drop the task Report reading as failed
When should you report a reading as Failed When the Water meter is physically damaged or is not at the GPS location When you want to remove that task from the list
The photo of the meter taken should contain : A clear view of the reading and the Meter number on the meter A picture of the meter
What do you do when Google directions shows arriving but meter is still not in sight Zoom into the follow your marker direction until you marker and location marker intersect Report as failed
what do you do when there are two meters at the same gps location Check their meter number or Click the view meter image button to see which meter you need to read Read any one of the two
